    B√†i th·ª±c h√†nh 4 B√†i th·ª±c h√†nh 5

# B√†i th·ª±c h√†nh 3

Trong b√†i n√†y b·∫°n c·∫ßn n·∫Øm b·∫Øt c√°c m·ª•c nh∆∞ sau :

  • T√¨m ƒë∆∞·ªùng ƒëi ng·∫Øn nh·∫•t b·∫±ng Dijkstra v√† bellman-Ford

  • Ki·ªÉm tra chu tr√¨nh √¢m v√† ·ª©ng d·ª•ng c·ªßa ƒë∆∞·ªùng ƒëi ng·∫Øn nh·∫•t

üí° TH∆Ø VI·ªÜN

S·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√°c th∆∞ vi·ªán sau:

#include <stdio.h>    // th∆∞ vi·ªán c∆° b·∫£n c·ªßa C
#include <stdbool.h>  // h·ªó tr·ª£ true/false cho C

‚á£ Download th∆∞ vi·ªán list.hopen in new window

‚ö†Ô∏è L∆ØU √ù

T·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c ƒë·ªânh trong ƒë·ªì th·ªã b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu t·ª´ 1 thay v√¨ 0, n√™n h√£y ƒë·ªÉ √Ω r√µ kh√¥ng th√¨ sai !!!

# T√¨m ƒë∆∞·ªùng ƒëi ng·∫Øn nh·∫•t b·∫±ng Dijkstra

void dijksta(Graph G, int s, List *parrent, List *cost){
    bool mark[50];
    int u,v;
    for (u = 1; u <= G.n; u++){ //* kh·ªüi t·∫°o m·∫£ng
        cost->Data[u] = 999;
        mark[u] = false;
        parrent->Data[u] = 0;
    }
    parrent->Size = cost->Size = G.n;

    cost->Data[s] = 0; //* ƒëi t·ª´ ƒë·ªânh s, v·ªÅ ƒë·∫øn ƒë·ªânh 
    parrent->Data[s] = -1; //* ƒë·ªânh b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu kh√¥ng c√≥ parent 

    for (int i = 1; i <= G.n; i++){
        int min_pi = 999;
        for (int j = 1; j <= G.n; j++){
            //* T√¨m ƒë·ªânh ch∆∞a duy·ªát c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã min_pi
            if(!mark[j] && cost->Data[j] < min_pi){
                min_pi = cost->Data[j];
                u = j;
            }
        }
        mark[u] = 1; //* ƒë√°nh d·∫•u ƒë√£ duy·ªát xong ƒë·ªânh ƒë√≥
        for (v = 1; v <= G.n; v++){
            if(G.A[u][v] != 0 && !mark[v]){
                int x = cost->Data[u] + G.A[u][v];
                if(x < cost->Data[v]){
                    cost->Data[v] = x;
                    parrent->Data[v] = u;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

# T√¨m ƒë∆∞·ªùng ƒëi ng·∫Øn nh·∫•t b·∫±ng bellman-Ford

void bellmanFord(Graph G, int s,List *cost, List *parrent){
    for(int i=1; i<= G.n; i++){ // kh·ªüi t·∫°o ban ƒë·∫ßu
        cost->Data[i] = 999;
        parrent->Data[i] = 0;
    }

    cost->Size = parrent->Size = G.n;
    
    cost->Data[s] = 0;
    parrent->Data[s] = -1;

    for(int it = 1; it < G.n; it++){
        for(int k = 1; k <= G.m; k++){
            int u = G.edge[k].u;
            int v = G.edge[k].v;
            int w = G.edge[k].w;
            int x = cost->Data[u] + w;
            if(x < cost->Data[v]){
                cost->Data[v] = x;
                parrent->Data[v] = u;
            }
        }
    }
}
